mapper.select: select * from SWP_waits where `r_uuid` like #{r_uuid} order by waitNum asc
select * from SWP_waits where `uuid` like #{uuid} and `r_uuid` like #{r_uuid}
mapper.insert: insert into SWP_waits(`uuid`, `r_uuid`, `waitNum`, `endpoint`, `p256dh`, `auth`) VALUES(#{uuid}, #{r_uuid}, IFNULL((select max(`waitNum`) from SWP_waits a where `r_uuid` like #{r_uuid})+1, 0 ), #{endpoint}, #{p256dh}, #{auth})
mapper.delete: delete from SWP_waits where `uuid` like #{uuid} and `r_uuid` like #{r_uuid}
